import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{Form,Button,Row,Col}from'react-bootstrap';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import Loader from'../components/Loader';import Message from'../components/Message';import FormContainer from'../components/FormContainer';import{register}from'../actions/userActions';import{validatePassword}from'../validators/passwordValidator';import{validateEmail}from'../validators/emailValidator';// Import the email validator
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RegisterScreen(){const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[confirmPassword,setConfirmPassword]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[errors,setErrors]=useState({});const[showPassword,setShowPassword]=useState(false);// State for showing password
